overview:
Gail Mullard is a geek, a digital enthusiast and mutli-tasker - the perfect person to manage a digital agency whilst catering to the needs of 2 growing kids, a husband and hamster (in that order).
She is a people pleaser - as can be witnessed with her rapid response customer service, a mathmatical whiz kid - as can be witnessed most afternoons as she interprets and calculates pivot tables and excel spreadsheets searching for meaning in the data and a girl with a quiet, but full on sense of humour (she loves nothing better than a corny joke).
